General.Name: HS Valve Co. Ltd
General.Industry: Machinery, Tools, Heavy Vehicles, Trains & Ships
General.Description: HS Valve Co., Ltd manufactures and sells valves in South Korea. It provides floating ball, trunnion mounted, welded ball, gate, globe, and check valves for chemical, oil and gas, and industrial plants. The company also exports its products. HS Valve Co., Ltd was founded in 1987 and is headquartered in Daegu, South Korea.
